original_title: Céline Dion: A New Day... (Live In Las Vegas)
overview: An unprecedented 5 year run! More than 700 sold out shows! 3 million spectators! Everything about the record -breaking show that changed the history of entertainment scene in Las Vegas! This 2-disc Blu-ray set includes Céline Dion's show in the Colosseum at Caesars Palace and three exclusive documentaries: Travel to Las Vegas with the fans- join Céline at home, in her car, in her dressing room and even backstage - find out all the secrets of "A New Day" More Than 5 hours of Never Before Seen Footage
title: Céline Dion: A New Day... (Live In Las Vegas)
